comment.shortText: A `Address` object would store the information about the resolved area, place, or organization.

shortText: The 5 digit Japanese municipality code (全国地方公共団体コード)
for the administrative division where the place this object represents
belongs.

comment.shortText: The "old" postal code that was used before February 2, 1998.
The postal code for the place this object represents.
The name of the prefecture in Kanji.
The reading for the name of the prefecture in katakana.

shortText: The name of the city.
The county name may precede it, or the name of the
ward would follow it in case the city has ordinance-designated wards.

text: * `"チチブグンナガトロチョウ"`
comment.shortText: The reading for the name of the city in katakana.

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.
shortText: The name of the area that usually corresponds to lowest part of the
administrative division levels ("town").

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.
comment.shortText: The reading of the name of the town.

text: Note that they don't always represent the actual name of the area,
in case they are expediently designated by Japan Post.
* `"西北小路町（猪熊通上立売上る、猪熊通寺之内下る、大宮通寺之内下る東入、大宮通寺之内半丁下る東入、大宮通寺之内下る東入１丁目、寺之内通大宮東入下る、寺之内通大宮東入１丁目下る）"`
* `"晴海　オフィスタワーＸ　１階"`
shortText: The unprocessed value(s) of the name of the area. It may consist of
multiple (non-administrative) sub-areas.

text: * `"イワテケンミヤコシハコイシ(ダイ2チワリ<70-136>-ダイ4チワリ<3-11>)"`
* `"トウキョウトチユウオウクハルミ　オフイスタワーX　1カイ"`
comment.shortText: The reading for the unprocessed value(s) of the name of the area.

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.
comment.shortText: The name of the (non-administrative) sub-area of the town.

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.
* `"大宮通寺之内半丁下る東入"`
shortText: The instructional phrase (通り名 in Japanese) very specific to Kyoto city,
which helps one to locate the place out of the area of the town.

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.
shortText: The name of the building, in case the postal code is designated to a building,
or its each floor.

text: This is a synthetic value; that means it resulted from our original
interpretation of the `town_raw` data, and the corresponding value might
well not be present in the original KEN_ALL data provided by Japan Post.

shortText: For the detail of the meaning of this property, See the API documentation.
The value has no use; we recommend not referring to this.
For the detail of the meaning of this property, See the API documentation.
The value has no use; we recommend not referring to this.
For the detail of the meaning of this property, See the API documentation.
The value has no use; we recommend not referring to this.
For the detail of the meaning of this property, See the API documentation.
The value has no use; we recommend not referring to this.
If the postal code is designated to an organization, or a division of such,
this property stores the `Corporation` object that describes it.
